- Come on. - Allison, that's not funny.

translation.en: sharing a lighthearted moment with Chinese businessman, Xiang Lao.
translation.es: Ese es Tamir Mafraad, el consejero de Aladeen, con el ejecutivo chino... ...Xiang Lao.

translation.en: Any thoughts on what they might be saying, Mike?
I thought I made out the words Harvey Keitel.
translation.es: Creo que distinguí las palabras Harvey Keitel.

translation.en: Hmm.
translation.es: INFORME ESPECIAL GENERAL ALADEEN FIRMA LA CONSTITUCIÓN

translation.en: Don't know what that meant.
translation.es: No sé lo que eso significa.

translation.en: Maybe they shared a hot dog together, I'm thinking?
That would make sense. He's wiping the mustard off his face and chest.
translation.es: Tendría sentido. Está limpiándose mostaza de su cara y pecho.

translation.en: Excuse me!
You have to let me in. You don't understand. He's trying to stop the signing!
translation.es: ¡Tienen que dejarme entrar! ¡Quiere parar la firma!

translation.en: Tamir is now speaking.
Today,
we begin a new era.
Wadiya will be open to the world.
Open to the future.
And open for business.
The document is ready to be signed, Supreme Leader.
translation.es: El documento está listo, Supremo Líder.

translation.en: What are you doing? This man is an imposter!
No! This traitor tried to kill me and had my beard removed!
translation.es: ¡Este traidor trató de matarme y me cortó la barba!

translation.en: - Look! - Oh!
Arrest the viper Tamir!
And now in another
amazing turn of events, Tamir Mafraad is being taken away.
translation.es: ...asombroso giro de eventos, están sacando a Tamir Mafraad.

translation.en: This constitution
is nothing but a license for oil companies
translation.es: ...no es más que una licencia para que las compañías petroleras...

translation.en: and foreign interests to destroy my beloved Wadiya!
translation.es: ...e intereses extranjeros destruyan mi amada Wadiya!

translation.en: Wadiya will remain a dictatorship!
Oh, be quiet.
Why are you guys so anti dictators?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se oponen tanto a los dictadores?

translation.en: Imagine if America was a dictatorship.
translation.es: Imagínense si EE.UU. fuera una dictadura.

translation.en: You could let 1% of the people have all the nation's wealth.
translation.es: El 1% de la población podría tener toda la riqueza del país.

translation.en: You could help your rich friends get richer by cutting their taxes
translation.es: Enriquecerían más a sus amigos ricos bajándoles los impuestos...

translation.en: and bailing them out when they gamble and lose.
translation.es: ...y rescatándolos cuando corren riesgos y fracasan.

translation.en: You could ignore the needs of the poor for health care and education.
translation.es: Podrían ignorar las necesidades médicas y educativas de los pobres.

translation.en: Your media would appear free
but would secretly be controlled by one person and his family.
translation.es: ...pero realmente los controlaría una persona y su familia.

translation.en: You could wiretap phones, you could torture foreign prisoners.
translation.es: Podrían intervenir teléfonos, torturar a reos extranjeros.

translation.en: You could have rigged elections.
You could lie about why you go to war.
translation.es: Podrían mentir sobre por qué van a la guerra.

translation.en: You could fill your prisons
with one particular racial group and no one would complain!
translation.es: ...con un solo grupo racial y nadie se quejaría.

translation.en: You could use the media to scare the people
translation.es: Podrían usar los medios para espantar al pueblo...

translation.en: into supporting policies that are against their interests.
translation.es: ...y hacer que apoye políticas contra sus intereses.

translation.en: I know this is hard for you Americans to imagine,
translation.es: Sé que esto es difícil de imaginar para los americanos...

translation.en: but please try.
I will tell you what democracy is!
translation.es: ¡Les diré lo que es la democracia!

translation.en: Democracy is the worst!
Endless talking and listening to every stupid opinion!
translation.es: ¡Hablar sin parar y oír todas las opiniones estúpidas!

translation.en: And everybody's vote counts,
no matter how crippled or black or female they are.
translation.es: no importa si son de lisiados, o negros, o mujeres!

translation.en: Democracy...
Democracy
has hairy armpits and could lose five pounds.
translation.es: ...tiene axilas peludas y podría bajar unos kilitos.

translation.en: Democracy looks like a midget in a chemo wig.
translation.es: La democracia parece una enana con peluca de quimioterapia.

translation.en: Democracy kisses you because she wants to,
translation.es: La democracia te besa porque quiere...

translation.en: not because her father is in the next room chained to a radiator
translation.es: ...no porque su padre está encadenado a un radiador...

translation.en: with electrodes attached to his nipples.
Democracy is flawed! She is not perfect!
translation.es: ¡La democracia tiene defectos! ¡Ella no es perfecta!

translation.en: But democracy,
I love you.
And that is why I call for real democracy!
translation.es: ¡Y por eso pido una democracia de verdad!

translation.en: A real constitution!
And real elections in Wadiya!
Come on!
Democracy, I will make you one of my wives.
translation.es: Democracia, te haré una de mis esposas.

translation.en: Okay, only wife. We'll vote on it.
translation.es: Bueno, la única. Lo pondremos a votación.

translation.en: I'll shave my armpits for you.
translation.es: Me afeitaré las axilas para ti.

translation.en: Praise be to the Creator!
And please stop using that organic deodorant. You could gas the Kurds with that stench.
translation.es: Y deja el desodorante orgánico. Podrías matar a kurdos con ese olor.

translation.en: You died protecting me, Efawadh.
Hello!
You are alive?
Of course! It is my job to be shot in the head.
translation.es: Claro, es mi trabajo recibir balazos en la cabeza.

translation.en: - Is he okay? - He's fine.
Luckily the bullet hit him in the brain.
translation.es: Por suerte, la bala le dio en el cerebro.

translation.en: Oh. So, um,
what now?
I return to Wadiya to participate in fair elections.
translation.es: Regreso a Wadiya a participar en elecciones justas.

translation.en: Let's now look back at the wonderful events of the past year.
translation.es: Repasemos los maravillosos eventos del año pasado.

translation.en: After Wadiya's first free elections,
translation.es: Después de las primeras elecciones libres de Wadiya...

translation.en: President Prime Minister Admiral General Aladeen
translation.es: ...el Presidente Primer Ministro Almirante General Aladeen...

translation.en: won 98.8% of the vote.
But the big story today is the marriage of President Prime Minister
translation.es: Pero la gran noticia es el matrimonio del Presidente Primer Ministro...

translation.en: Admiral General Aladeen and his new bride, Zoey.
translation.es: ...Almirante General Aladeen y su nueva novia, Zoey.

translation.en: I now pronounce you man and wife.
translation.es: Ahora los declaro marido y mujer.

translation.en: Are you okay, my love? What did you step on?
Oh, yes! No, no. It's my people's tradition. We always smash a glass at weddings.
translation.es: Es la tradición de mi pueblo. En las bodas rompemos una copa.

translation.en: - I'm Jewish! - What?
Mazel tov!
Are you okay?
That's fine. I don't mind. It's great!
translation.es: Está bien, no me importa. ¡Es fantástico!

translation.en: Come here, my love.
Jachnoon, President Prime Minister Aladeen.
Jachnoon. Nadal. I have to be back at the palace in an hour.
translation.es: Yajnun. Tengo que volver al palacio en una hora.

translation.en: Zoey thinks I'm at yoga.
translation.es: Zoey cree que estoy en el yoga.

translation.en: I have great news. We are just days away from testing the new missiles.
translation.es: Buenas noticias: estamos a unos días de probar los nuevos misiles.

translation.en: I have re- engineered the oxidizing ducts and the payload delivery systems.
translation.es: Rediseñé el sistema de entrega de la carga...

translation.en: But you'll be happy to know, the missile is now pointy!
translation.es: ...pero le dará gusto saber que el misil ahora es puntiagudo.

translation.en: Who cares if it's pointy?
translation.es: ¿A quién le importa que sea puntiagudo?

translation.en: What?
You do. You care if it's pointy.
translation.es: A ti. A ti te importa que lo sea.

translation.en: Why would I care about such a trivial detail?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me iba a importar un detalle tan trivial?

translation.en: Are you serious? Are you serious right now?
Of course I'm serious. That's why you had me executed!
translation.es: - Claro que sí. - ¡Por eso me mandaste ejecutar!

translation.en: The shape of the missile has nothing to do with the payload delivery.
translation.es: La forma del misil no tiene nada que ver con la carga.

translation.en: That's what I said! That's what I said the first time!
- No, that's what I said, and you went crazy. - No!
So, we, um, we're opening 300 Women's Centers,
translation.es: Vamos a abrir 300 centros para mujeres...

translation.en: but I'm going to have to take a break for a little bit because
translation.es: ...pero voy a tener que tomar un pequeño descanso porque...

translation.en: I'm pregnant.
What?
Are you having a boy or an abortion?
translation.es: ¿Vas a tener un varón o un aborto?

translation.en: Hello, gentlemen. How you doin'? Are you guys friends of the deceased?
Do you want me to say this in front of his widow?
translation.es: ¿Quiere que diga esto enfrente de la viuda?

translation.en: I was his lover. No. That is not true.
translation.es: - Yo era su amante. - No, no es cierto.

translation.en: I saw him perform with the Globetrotters.
translation.es: Yo lo vi jugar con los Globetrotters.

translation.en: I thought he was outstanding. I befriended him.
translation.es: Me pareció excepcional. Me hice su amigo.

translation.en: No, it's a different person.
His message of don't worry and being happy
translation.es: Su mensaje de no preocuparse y ser feliz... ...era muy poderoso.

translation.en: was so powerful.
translation.es: ...era muy poderoso. No, ese es Bobby McFerrin. Te lo dije.

translation.en: No, this is Bobby McFerrin. I told you this outside.
translation.es: No, ese es Bobby McFerrin. Te lo dije.

translation.en: Whatever the scandal you went through,
translation.es: Por más feo que haya sido el escándalo...

translation.en: you're still the best golfer in the world.
translation.es: ...aún eres el mejor golfista del mundo.

translation.en: Let's go.
Okay. Let's rehearse this. Role play, role play.
translation.es: Vamos a ensayar esto. Lo dramatizamos.

translation.en: So, Secretary General, your soldiers will weep...
I am so sorry!
Listen, it was not my fault.
I mean, somebody had set the safety catch
to Aladeen instead of Aladeen.
translation.es: ...en aladeen en vez de en aladeen.

translation.en: Look, I mean, this whole gun...
Zoey.
Mmm- mmm! That's some good head!
That is called payback and it feels so good!
translation.es: ¡Eso se llama venganza y se siente rico!

translation.en: How did it feel for you? How did it feel for you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué te pareció a ti? - ¿Qué te pareció a ti?

translation.en: I prefer it with goats.
Where is the Supreme Leader?
Now that is called payback!
- - Oh, great!
Don't touch it. Don't touch it.
translation.es: No lo toques, no lo toques.

translation.en: You don't have to touch it.
Sorry. I was...
Just give us... We don't...
Just give me a couple of millimeters to myself.
translation.es: Sólo dame un par de milímetros para mí.
